price: 84. Puisses-tu faire que je sois cité en bien par les langues des générations futures.
arabic: وَٱجۡعَل لِّي لِسَانَ صِدۡقٖ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-ij'ʿal lī lisāna ṣid'qin fī al-ākhirīna
